organic_results.title: Appraisal, Not Applause: A Rejoinder to Peek, Picou, Alston and Curry
organic_results.snippet: After pointing out the evidence that Stevenson cited for the academic achievement of athletes and nonathletes we were surprised that Peek et al. failed to mention Stevenson's (1975) conclusion on this topic:" Overall, it must be concluded that there does appear to be a positive correlation between academic achievement and participation in sport"(p. 294). Peek et al. have misrepresented Stevenson's conclusion on the topic under discussion (ie, educational attainment) by citing his conclusion that bears on the cause and effect nature of …

publication_info.summary: DM Landers, DM Landers - Sociology of Education, 1979 - JSTOR
